title: Boeing 737-800 Illustrated Parts Catalog - Chapter 29: Hydraulic Power
content: This Illustrated Parts Catalog (IPC) provides detailed parts information for the hydraulic power system (ATA Chapter 29) of the Boeing 737-800 aircraft. It includes part numbers, illustrations, and assembly diagrams for all hydraulic system components, including pumps, reservoirs, accumulators, filters, valves, and lines.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
This Illustrated Parts Catalog (IPC) provides detailed parts information for the hydraulic power system (ATA Chapter 29) of the Boeing 737-800 aircraft. The catalog is organized according to the Air Transport Association (ATA) specification 100 chapter system.

This catalog is intended for use by properly trained and qualified maintenance personnel. All part replacements must be performed in accordance with the appropriate maintenance manuals and applicable regulatory requirements.

The catalog is regularly updated to incorporate the latest parts information. Always ensure you are using the most current revision. The revision status can be verified on the Revision Status page or through the Boeing Customer Portal.

Cross-reference: For maintenance procedures, refer to the Boeing 737-800 Aircraft Maintenance Manual (doc-001).

sections.title: How to Use This Catalog
sections.content:
2.1 CATALOG ORGANIZATION

This catalog is organized by ATA chapter, section, subject, and figure number. The hydraulic power system is covered in ATA Chapter 29, which is divided into the following sections:

- 29-00: General
- 29-10: Main Hydraulic System
- 29-20: Auxiliary Hydraulic System
- 29-30: Indicating System
- 29-40: Hydraulic Fluid Storage and Transfer

Each section contains figures that illustrate assemblies and components. Each figure is accompanied by a parts list that provides the following information:

- Item Number: Corresponds to the callout number in the illustration
- Part Number: Manufacturer's part number
- Description: Name and description of the part
- Units Per Assembly: Number of parts used in the assembly
- Effectivity: Aircraft serial numbers or configurations to which the part applies
- Spares Category: Indicates recommended spares stocking level

2.2 PART NUMBER IDENTIFICATION

Part numbers in this catalog use the following format:

- Boeing part numbers: XXXXXXX-XXX (7-digit base number followed by a 3-digit dash number)
- Vendor part numbers: As assigned by the vendor, often with a prefix indicating the vendor

2.3 EFFECTIVITY CODES

The following effectivity codes are used in this catalog:

- ALL: Applies to all aircraft
- SNXXXX: Applies to aircraft with serial number XXXX and subsequent
- SNXXXX-YYYY: Applies to aircraft with serial numbers from XXXX through YYYY
- PRE-SNXXXX: Applies to aircraft with serial numbers before XXXX

2.4 SPARES CATEGORY CODES

The following spares category codes are used in this catalog:

- A: High usage, recommended for line station stocking
- B: Medium usage, recommended for main base stocking
- C: Low usage, recommended for overhaul facility stocking
- D: Very low usage, procure as needed

2.5 CROSS-REFERENCE INDEXES

The following cross-reference indexes are provided at the end of the catalog:

- Part Number to Figure Number Index
- Vendor Code to Vendor Name Index
- Component Name to Figure Number Index

sections.title: Hydraulic Pumps and Motors
sections.content:
3.1 ENGINE-DRIVEN HYDRAULIC PUMP ASSEMBLY

Figure 29-11-01: Engine-Driven Hydraulic Pump Assembly

Item | Part Number | Description | Units Per Assembly | Effectivity | Spares Category
-----|-------------|-------------|-------------------|------------|----------------
1 | HYD-PUMP-001 | Pump Assembly, Hydraulic, Engine-Driven | 2 | ALL | A
2 | HYD-MOUNT-001 | Mounting Bracket, Pump | 2 | ALL | C
3 | HYD-SEAL-001 | Seal, Drive Shaft | 2 | ALL | A
4 | HYD-BOLT-001 | Bolt, Mounting, Pump | 8 | ALL | B
5 | HYD-WASH-001 | Washer, Lock, Mounting Bolt | 8 | ALL | B
6 | HYD-CONN-001 | Connector, Hydraulic, Pressure Line | 2 | ALL | B
7 | HYD-CONN-002 | Connector, Hydraulic, Return Line | 2 | ALL | B
8 | HYD-CONN-003 | Connector, Hydraulic, Case Drain | 2 | ALL | B
9 | HYD-SWIT-001 | Switch, Pressure, Low | 2 | ALL | B
10 | HYD-WIRE-001 | Wire Harness, Pressure Switch | 2 | ALL | C

3.2 HYDRAULIC PUMP DETAIL PARTS

Figure 29-11-02: Hydraulic Pump Detail Parts

Item | Part Number | Description | Units Per Assembly | Effectivity | Spares Category
-----|-------------|-------------|-------------------|------------|----------------
1 | HYD-HOUS-001 | Housing, Pump | 1 | ALL | C
2 | HYD-SHFT-001 | Shaft, Drive | 1 | ALL | B
3 | HYD-BEAR-001 | Bearing, Drive Shaft | 2 | ALL | B
4 | HYD-SEAL-002 | Seal, Housing | 1 | ALL | A
5 | HYD-BLCK-001 | Block, Cylinder | 1 | ALL | B
6 | HYD-PIST-001 | Piston Set (9 pieces) | 1 | ALL | B
7 | HYD-PLAT-001 | Plate, Valve | 1 | ALL | B
8 | HYD-SWSH-001 | Swashplate Assembly | 1 | ALL | B
9 | HYD-COMP-002 | Compensator Assembly, Pressure | 1 | SN12501 and subsequent | A
10 | HYD-COMP-001 | Compensator Assembly, Pressure (superseded by HYD-COMP-002) | 1 | PRE-SN12501 | A
11 | HYD-SEAL-KIT-001 | Seal Kit, Complete | 1 | ALL | A
12 | HYD-RETG-001 | Retainer, Bearing | 2 | ALL | C
13 | HYD-SPRI-001 | Spring, Compensator | 1 | ALL | B
14 | HYD-BOLT-002 | Bolt, End Cap | 6 | ALL | C
15 | HYD-ENDP-001 | End Cap, Pump | 1 | ALL | C

NOTE: HYD-COMP-002 incorporates an improved pressure compensator spool with enhanced surface hardening. Refer to Service Bulletin SB-2025-01 (doc-004) and Airworthiness Directive AD-2025-02 (doc-005) for information on replacement requirements.

sections.title: Ordering Information
sections.content:
5.1 ORDERING PROCEDURES

To order parts listed in this catalog, contact Boeing Spares or an authorized distributor. When ordering, provide the following information:

1. Customer name and account number
2. Aircraft model and serial number
3. Part number
4. Quantity required
5. Desired delivery date
6. Shipping instructions
7. Purchase order number

5.2 BOEING SPARES CONTACT INFORMATION

Boeing Spares
Phone: +1-800-555-2000
Fax: +1-800-555-2001
Email: spares@boeing.com
Website: www.myboeingfleet.com

5.3 AUTHORIZED DISTRIBUTORS

The following distributors are authorized to supply Boeing parts:

- Aviall (A Boeing Company)
  Phone: +1-800-555-3000
  Website: www.aviall.com

- KLX Aerospace Solutions
  Phone: +1-800-555-4000
  Website: www.klxaerospace.com

- Satair (An Airbus Company)
  Phone: +1-800-555-5000
  Website: www.satair.com

5.4 AOG SUPPORT

For Aircraft On Ground (AOG) situations requiring immediate parts support, contact:

Boeing AOG Desk
Phone: +1-800-555-2002 (24/7 support)
Email: aog@boeing.com

5.5 PART SUBSTITUTION AND SUPERSEDURE

When a part has been superseded by a new part number, the new part number will be indicated in the catalog. Always order the latest part number unless specific circumstances require the original part.

If a direct replacement part is not available, contact Boeing Technical Support for approved substitutions:

Boeing Technical Support
Phone: +1-800-555-2003
Email: techsupport@boeing.com
